contest-event.event-date: Sept. 29, 1923 D National Championship of Great Britain (Crystal Palace) National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) 1 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-championship-section European Championships The current Nationals contest began in 1900, but there was a previous 'Nationals' contest run 40 years earlier: Enderby Jackson's Great National Contest. Championship Oliver Cromwell Crystal Palace (Concert Hall), Crystal Palace Park, Sydenham, County of London, England, UK Prizes: 1st: 100 Pounds plus the 1000 Guinea Trophy 2nd: 50 Pounds plus the Daily Telegraph Challenge Cup 3rd: 30 Pounds 4th: 20 Pounds Maurice Johnstone was appointed as reserve adjudicator. May 14, 2010, 9:26 p.m. Aug. 28, 2013, 1:36 p.m. 1 Luton Band William Halliwell 2 Black Dyke Band William Halliwell 3 Fodens Band William Halliwell 4 St. Hilda Colliery William Halliwell 5 Sowerby Bridge Subscription William Halliwell 6 Creswell Colliery Band J.
